mapper.select: SELECT u.name, u.email, u.phone, u.role, u.created_at AS createdAt, u.updated_at AS updatedAt, u.penalty_expiration AS penaltyExpiration, COALESCE(SUM(b.overdue_days), 0) AS totalOverdueDays FROM user u LEFT JOIN borrow b ON u.id = b.user_id AND b.status = 'OVERDUE' WHERE u.withdraw = FALSE GROUP BY u.id, u.name, u.email, u.phone, u.role, u.created_at, u.updated_at, u.penalty_expiration ORDER BY u.id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE withdraw = FALSE
